tool_description:
Send real physical postcards using our partner API. 
A print on demand service.
name: Postcards By Stannp
title: Postcards By Stannp

api_list.name: Create a Postcard

required_parameters.name: message
required_parameters.description: he postcard message which goes on the back of the card.

required_parameters.name: image
required_parameters.description: A binary file, base64 data, or a URL for an image.

optional_parameters.name: reference
optional_parameters.description: Any reference code that you may want to pass over.
